# shippingAddress

**Instance Property**

The user-selected shipping address for this transaction.

## Declaration

```swift
unowned(unsafe) var shippingAddress: ABRecord? { get }
```

## Discussion

Only the fields specified in the the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest/requiredShippingAddressFields] property of the [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentRequest] object are populated. If no required shipping fields were specified, the value of this property is `nil`.

## Deprecated

- **billingAddress**: The user-selected billing address for this transaction.
